Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Manchester in 1970...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Capital City on 8/24/1982, striking out 6...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Diablo on 6/1/1984, striking out 4...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/21/1985 with a Inflamed Tricep Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Ashburn on 2/16/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $7,279,500 per year...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
